TEXT: Upon pickup, obtain #yN'loth's #yFace [REMOVE_SPACE]. Obtain #yN'loth's Face at the start of the next #b2 acts. Open a chest in Act 3 to complete this Quest.
EXTRA_TEXT: If you don't have a #ySapphire #yKey [REMOVE_SPACE], obtain it. Remove all #yN'loth's #yFaces and obtain #b2 random Relics for each #yN'loth's #yFace removed.
